message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to our negotiations!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. How about 70-30?
I'm not comfortable with 70-30. Can you meet me in the middle at 55-45?
Let's meet in the middle at 50-50. It's only fair!
I'm willing to give a bit more, but I still think I deserve a slight edge. How about 55-45?
I'm not comfortable with 55-45. Can you meet me at 52-48?
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while. 55-45 is my final offer!
